summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 30th Avenue Southwest (east side) from West Adams Street to Yancy Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8464 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
